alfredsnippet.snippet:
What have they been doing recently?
What do they want to do / get from their next position?
Why do you still want to be a manager?
What is the hardest part of being a manager?
What have been your most positive and negative management experiences?
What have been your most negative management experiences?
What was your most recent big mistake? Why did it occur and how do you repair the situation?
What is your preferred management style?
What success looks like as an EM?
How do you keep your team motivated?
Describe a situation where you were suggesting a course of action which you did not necessarily support. How do you stay motivated and engaged in those situation
How do you communicate information to your team? / How do you prepare for your staff meeting?
Describe your best hire. Why were they your best hire?
Describe your worst hire. How did you manage him/her?
Have you developed a  product without a spec? If so, how?




Questions the candidate asked me





Decision:
alfredsnippet.name: EngManager
